meanings.definition: The outer layer of an organ or body part, especially the brain.
meanings.sent1: The cortexes of the brain help with thinking and understanding.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the cortexes of the brain to learn more about how it functions.
meanings.sent3: The cortexes of the brain were having a party, celebrating their important role.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden, with the cortexes blooming like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The cortexes of the brain are like the outer shell of a precious pearl, protecting its valuable contents.
